elements.text: it's still really hard to do any kind of anonymous payment for anything without cryptocurriences

text: I’ve read somewhere that most of the time is harder to maintain anonymity with a cryptocurrency than with other payment methods, is that not the case? e.g. <https://cryptforensic.com/2019/01/08/how-anonymous-are-cryptocurrencies/>

attachments.title: How Anonymous Are Cryptocurrencies? - Cryptforensic Investigators
attachments.text: Cryptocurrencies are sometimes thought of as being anonymous. However, this is incorrect. Cryptocurrencies are usually not anonymous but pseudonymous.
attachments.fallback: Cryptforensic Investigators: How Anonymous Are Cryptocurrencies? - Cryptforensic Investigators

text: I don’t get what the issue is. Are they requiring people to pay for the app in this new crytocurrency? Seems like not. So people are upset that they’ve added a feature that no one is required to use? Maybe I’m missing something.
